_header: Jesu that was born of Mary free
Subjects: historical poems; peace, desire for; Wars of the Roses
_description: ‘Þat Pese may stond’ — eight 12-line stanzas (ababababbcbc) with refrain, ‘And lene hus grace that pes may stand’

NLS1931.First Lines:
Ihesu þat was borne of mare freAs he hase pwower and mey
                    best…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…And bryng hus all to þat bygyng bryȝtÞer Joy
                    and blys ys euer lastonde
